Build transfer command for py2r or r2py

Source: R/rxp_io.R
build_transfer_command.Rd

Build transfer command for py2r or r2py

Usage

build_transfer_command(out_name, expr_str, direction)

Arguments

out_name

Character output name

expr_str

Character expression string

direction

Character direction

Value

Character command
